errors.noServerConnection: Server cannot be reach, please verify your connection

compassHelper.title: Optimize your phone location
compassHelper.firstInstruction: Move your phone to draw a eight in the air and do this three times to optimize your phone location.
compassHelper.secondInstruction: Be a meter of more far from metal objects will avoid your gps to be distrubed.

location.title: Stars tracker App Permission
location.message: Stars tracker App needs access to your current location to track stars from your current location
location.userDenied: The location access resquest has been denied, without the access this application cannot work.
location.neverAskAgain: As you choosed to never be asked again for a location request, if you want to enable the location you have to follow theses steps.

stepsToEnableLocation.first: Click on the below button to open the app settings
stepsToEnableLocation.third: Click on Location and allow the location
